content:
Q: What do Medical Expenses benefit and Hospital & Surgical Expenses benefit cover?
A: We will reimburse the Insured (your domestic helper) for Hospitalisation and Surgical Expenses (including Day Surgery) incurred in Singapore as a result of an accident and/or sickness sustained by the maid during the period of insurance.
questions: How does the policy define the scope of Hospitalisation and Surgical Expenses covered under the Medical Expenses and Hospital & Surgical Expenses benefits for a domestic helper?

What types of surgical procedures, including day surgery, are eligible for reimbursement under the Hospital & Surgical Expenses benefit for the insured maid?

Are there any conditions or exclusions that might limit the reimbursement of hospitalisation expenses for the domestic helper under these benefits?
What documentation is required to support a claim for Hospitalisation and Surgical Expenses incurred by the insured maid in Singapore?
Does the policy cover hospital and surgical expenses if the domestic helper receives treatment outside Singapore, or is coverage strictly limited to Singapore?
How does the policy handle reimbursement if the domestic helper's hospitalisation is due to a pre-existing condition versus a new accident or sickness?
Are outpatient surgical procedures included under the Hospital & Surgical Expenses benefit, or is coverage limited to inpatient and day surgery only?
